column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: Â ------ An aboned newborn baby was found at 4:30 am on Thursday
column9: Phnom Penh.------A scavenger driving a trailer along the road noticed that a black bag had baby equipment nearby
column10: and when checking found the infant inside.------He called ABC radio station and told them what he had discovered and asked for help.------An ABC radio team went to the scene and took the baby to Kantha Bopha Hospital immediately.------ ------http://www.arey-news.com/archives/295639
